body: Read the new chapter 5 post fap, good stuff, lol.
well that's a complain bible right there

Honestly, heres my opinione:
1st one Is useless, nothing really happens; 2nd I'm not really a fan of Senseis starting the relationship, and this guy really seems to just be taking advantage on a clueless girl, so it's a no from me, but someone else may like It. 3rd one Is great, although how great can It be to fuck a 6th grade loli :/ 
Oh well, 4th one I have mixer feelings about It: on one hand, there's still the taking advantage part, but it's saved by the fact that the men is not a scumbag, you should treat ladies right! 
5th one, meh, same story, I don't like middle schoolersXteachers, I think there's a big differenze between a Sensei with a 15 y/o and a 19 one. So yeah, not really for me.
Last one is again, taking advantage of a clueless girl, of course you won't find someone like her in real life, and at least they have the same age. Honestly speaking, the last one was the best one for the gags, the ventriloquism shit was amazing.
